website_summaries.verdict: A smooth, elegant glider and ottoman set that adds a hint of glamour to a room's decor.
pros: Upholstered in sophisticated and awe-inspiring faux leather
Extra plush cushioning delivers exceptional comfort
Outfitted with a gliding mechanism for smooth, seamless motion
Provides a modern upgrade to a traditional glider and ottoman set
cons: Upholstery tends to wear down quickly and may tear or rip over time

customer_reviews.title: shredding and tearing after 2 years of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair February 2014. This chair is shredding on the surface. The leather quality is not good. I have a couch that is out lasting this chair. I am the only one that sits in this chair at my house and I am always careful with it. I do not wear jeans while sitting on this chair and I am always in yoga pants "ha ha" so I have no idea how this chair is shredding. I am not a heavy person either. I am disappointed and I will be dropping it off at goodwill. It looks awful in my house now and I am embarrassed when friends come over and see a bad looking piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: HWStyle

customer_reviews.title: Basic, Comfortable and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT one of those $5,000+ "Scandinavian" recliners/ottomans, or this would not be a 4 star rating; but for the price? I'm happy. After several weeks using the chair, I see a need for some extra padding in the back and on the seat, but that's not really a big deal since there is a zipper on the back/seat component that allows adding extra padding. I'll buy a foam padding sheet, cut to size and insert for extra comfort. I'm not a big fan of the ottoman (it's a bit high for me), so I use a different foot rest. Basic, comfortable and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: after a year and half of use the vinyl is separating, this is clearly poor material used, this happened to two chairs we bought at the same time, no kids or pets, contacted the manufacturer they informed me the seller has to take care of it, contacted Amazon and they compensated me a $5 credit and that I"m stuck with the chairs, do yourself a favor avoid these chairs from Coaster at all cost
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Wein

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice, But Not Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: When we got our glider, one of the plastic pieces under the armrest (not sure what it is) was snapped in half when we opened the box. The glider assembly wasn't too difficult, which was nice. However, the chair was not comfortable at all. There was one center spot in the upright cushion that was especially thin and uncomfortable. The cushioning appears to be very fluffy and soft in the picture, but it didn't feel that way. We found a similar but much better glider at another store for $25 less than this one, so we returned this to Amazon. This was a disappointing purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: tredford

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe, short lasting, do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this late June 2017. In November 2018 metal bars under the chair and ottoman started breaking off. The chairas of Feb 2019 reclines so far back you can hit the floor. It'sincredibly unsafe. For the price this shouod have lasted longer than 17 /18 months. As far as usage, this was in our baby's nursery. Used daily to rock baby to sleep. Nothing extraneous. And yet the chair and foot rest are completely broken down. O do not recommend this unsafe product.
customer_reviews.author: LondonDungeon

customer_reviews.title: Seat padding is not so good but not hard to fix.
customer_reviews.text: I like the frame and its construction a lot so I do recommend it. the only problem i have with it is the seat padding is not good. I like that it was easy to assemble and all of the bolts are easy to get to. I bought a ROHO Mosaic Seating and Positioning Cushion Re-Engineered (20 X 18 W/Standard Cover) here on Amazon and placed it under the seat and now i love it.
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: We liked the chair when we first got it
customer_reviews.text: After a few months all 4 welds on the base broke. I tried for weeks to get something done. I kept taking pictures of the base. They wanted me to take a picture of the Manufacturer label. I took pictures of everything I could find. There was no manufacturing label. I waited weeks for a response. We liked the chair when we first got it, but we would love to get this resolved. Update: As of the first week of August 2018. No response from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: THM

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Over all this was a good chair for the price. The leather is soft and the support is good. I put it together with little effort. There are no words on the instructions, only pictures but it's not difficult. Sturdy and comfortable. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Some assembly requested
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was not apparent until delivered in pieces. This was listed in description but not easy to see. Single Allen wrench provided did NOT fit all screws. One screw bore hole was over done and difficult to get screw thread to take. Overall Faux leather Chinese made and a bit cheezy in feel. Outside of box was damaged. Item also took three weeks for delivery via FEDEX GROUND. Recommendation: spend a little more money and get something nicer.
customer_reviews.author: david sellers

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality fabric.  No way to contact seller.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter in February 2015 for her baby. It has cracked and ripped. Very poor quality leatherette.
customer_reviews.author: MAH

customer_reviews.title: Great chair.
customer_reviews.text: The chair looks great, just like the picture and for the price... it can't be beat. We bought for a new mother to use when breastfeeding, etc. We unpacked it on a Saturday and by Monday we noticed the dreaded squeak! However... it quickly went away and we have not heard it since. Overall, I think it's a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lama

customer_reviews.title: Set-up was not easy - a few screws would not fit
customer_reviews.text: **I use it mainly for reading to my daughter and rocking her to sleep.** I was so excited to get this chair, as my previous old glider started to make too many noises. I wanted to go with leather, as it looks nicer in my bedroom. As I'm rocking my kiddo to sleep, before I know it I'm all the way back reclined. So it's a constant tug or war with this thing to stay only partially reclined. Otherwise its okay. Wishing I would had just went with another glider. Set-up was not easy - a few screws would not fit.
customer_reviews.author: BronsonLexa

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty cheap quality in general
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty cheap quality in general. We've had it about a year and the fake leather is coming off pretty bad. It squeaks horribly. After 3 separate times of giving it a wd40 bath to stop it from squeaking that no longer works. I don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Great price and very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and will packaged. At first I thought the seat would be too low but once that cushion goes on its just right! Also, I prefer sitting up a bit straighter and was pleasantly surprised by this. Cushion is very posh. Perfect for rocking and knitting! With side pouches to hold projects. Cats love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair.  Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Buying a chair online is risky; what's comfortable for one person isn't for another. This chair turned out to be very comfortable for both my wife (115 lbs, 5'0") and me (174 lbs, 5'8"). Can't think of anything about it we'd change. Chair arrived very well packaged and protected. Assembly was a no-brainer; took about 30 minutes. Frame construction feels substantial and well-built. Upholstered components seem high quality. Chair swivels 360 degrees, chair and ottoman rock (glide) nicely. Both operate with no noise at all. If we're as happy with it in a couple of months as we are the day after it arrived, we'll have scored big-time. Excellent chair at a good price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: N. Gregory Soter

customer_reviews.title: It's actually a comfortable chair. A few issues though
customer_reviews.text: It's actually a comfortable chair. A few issues though. If you have wood or veneer floors, you're going to want to put some sort of padding on the bottom before you even set them on the floor. There are a few defects that can easily scratch these types of floors. If you have carpet, nothing to worry about. Secondly, both the chair and ottoman developed loud squeaks after only a few days use. I'm pretty sure I'll be able to fix that when I get some time but shouldn't have to. But overall it's worth what you pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: graffiti

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Quality Steel and Leather
customer_reviews.text: This is an exellent choice. I chose the metal frame over the wood after reading reviews about the wood splitting. Not knowing the facts. This was a great choice and very easy for a 65 y/o woman to put together. Dad loves it, very nice leather and he can keep his feet up for his heart. You just have to align the cushions up and armrests. The ottoman cushion and a few bolts and you are done! It really comes mostly together in the box. Very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: AussiegirlIngridTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: purchased 4 years ago and still in great condition
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this 4 years ago for our first child and will continue to use it for our new baby in a few months. It still looks brand new. Very easy to clean-just wipe of with a wet towel or wet wipe. These went up $100 since we bought it but it is worth it. Looks so modern and trendy that we might just use it in the living room once the kids dont need it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Comfort chair with Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a wood rocker recliner that did not swivel from another company and it broke after 13 months. I had no extended warranty so I pitched it. This one seems very well made and is smooth in it's movements. It took 15 minutes to put both pieces together I bought the 5 year warranty for very little at the same time I purchased the chair at Amazon. I will either get 5 years of use or I will get my money back. I put it together, examining it closely and found no weak points in it's construction. It is going to get a lot of use everyday so I couldn't neglect to buy the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Comfy chair!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this chair as a gift before I read the reviews. Once I did read them, I was worried that I had made a bad choice and would never receive it as so many reviewers complained had happened to them. But it arrived on the very day predicted and it's every bit as nice as I hoped! The only reason I'm not giving it the full five stars is that it came in a lot of pieces and had to be built at home. It was time consuming and a little aggravating but the end result is a really nice chair at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: NanaBird

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I only gave one star because I couldn't give 0 stars. This chair is horrible. I gave my father this chair as a father's day gift. About 6 months later the "leather" started to crack. Now the whole chair is falling apart. It's not used very often so it's not like it has been abused or even worn out. If it were not such a hassle to send it back we would have sent this piece of junk back long ago. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: glider recliners
customer_reviews.text: we purchased 2 of these recliners. We removed sofa in our RV and replaced with these 2 recliners. They were easy to assemble, are comfortable, and look awesome in our RV
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy shopper
customer_reviews.text: Yes yes and yes. I was scared to get it because these types of chairs usually are cheaply made but this feels like great quality. Only have had it a few days of course but am really pleased so far. I'll even add a photo cause that's what I really wanted to see when I was looking for a good chair.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great chair overall! Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love that this chair rocks and swivels plus the foot rest rocks as well! The downsides: poor lumber support, squeaks occasionally, and my knees are uncomfortable when my feet are on the foot rest. I’d still buy it again!!! I’ve owned mine for a little over a year now and it is still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Zukowski

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!! After 2 weeks of use a very loud sound started to appear, imagine at 3am with a new born and a very annoying sound is there, is not an screw since it is 4:33am and i just woke up to tighten all of them and nothing, please just dont buy it. Wasted money!!! -1 star
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto B

customer_reviews.title: Received with a small tear on the arm.
customer_reviews.text: Received chair yesterday. Took 16 days to receive it via Fed Ex. Did not send tracking info until I requested it and then it actually shipped when I asked for it. Chair came with small tear on arm and the material runs frayed about 2 inches. One of the bolts was stripped. Threw a blanket on it because now I’m afraid the material won’t last. Disappointed - new chair with tear. Not worth the trouble to take apart and send back.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Anaya

customer_reviews.title: difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The bolts & screws needed a lot of WD40 to fit together properly. Smooth glide. Expected better quality of materials & workmanship (metal seat & back slats are very thin, flimsy) for the price.
customer_reviews.author: deborah

customer_reviews.title: Did not last a month
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the chair when I got it. It is very comfy and the cushions provide great support. The chair worked well for a while then began to make noises. I had the chair less than a month and the chair completely broke in half on the left side. Two of the three bars at the bottom on the left armrest broke. Very disappointed in how quickly it deteriorated.
customer_reviews.author: Keagan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great chair especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 95 year old mom - she loves it because it swivels and rocks. She’s 5’2” tall. The only reason I didn’t give it a 5 is I feel a bar across the front - just under the seat. She doesn’t seem to feel this and is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Harleyjan99

customer_reviews.title: New office chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is super comfortable and easy to put together. Keep a vacuum around for the packaging clean. I take naps when I study and in order for my naps not to turn into a nights sleep I needed to buy a reclining chair. This works, I wish it was slightly wider for my shoulders and went back even further, but that doesn't take away from how please I am. A few other reviews stated they heard squeaking at some point. This is a new purchase so when I put it together I had my wd-40 and simply used it when putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Raizen

customer_reviews.title: I can say that it's really comfortable and we'll padded
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it yesterday and it arrived today! Real quick! My 11 year old son of it together without much trouble. I can say that it's really comfortable and we'll padded. I don't know how long it will last and I expect the cushions to get matted down, so I will write updates periodically.
customer_reviews.author: Goldfish

customer_reviews.title: Horrible clicking noise after less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: After less than a year, starting making a horrible clicking noise while rocking. Completely useless now. I looked underneath and its not like some part is catching on another part. The mechanism is just making a LOUD click on each rock and there doesnt seem to be anything I can do about it.
customer_reviews.author: herderess

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I put it together myself. Very easy! It looks very nice and it is very comfortable! So far I am very happy with my chair. I did a lot of searching in stores and on-line before I decided. I feel I made the correct decision.
customer_reviews.author: dmh128

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend, exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: These were everything we wanted and more! I was honestly nervous about purchasing chairs for our living room off of the internet, and at such a low price I was worried they would be cheap looking and feeling. They were easy to assemble and are very plush and comfortable. We have had them for over a month now and they are used daily with absolutely no problems. I would definitely recommend these chairs for anyone looking for a comfortable glider. The only issue we have found is that they do not recline very far, so that is something to consider when purchasing. All together, we are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: After about a year and a half of use the faux leather started cracking on the seat and arm rests. the mechanism was great, just cheap thin material. Was hoping it would last at least 3 or 4 years' Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: btrent

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for here.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is kinda rinky dink, but what can you expect for the price. Putting it together is a little tricky, but I was able to assemble it by myself. It's comfortable, but quirky. For example, when I set a recline position and tighten the handle, if I get up or squirm around too much, it will go back to a full upright position. Again for the price, I'm OK with it and the materials are what you'd expect.
customer_reviews.author: S. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: We are extremely happy with this chair. We bought it as our nursery chair, but have moved it to the living room and everyone is loving it as a tv chair. It looks beautiful with our expensive furniture and wipes clean with a wet cloth when our 2 yo puts his dirty hand print on it. It was easily put together.. And it shipped well! Box was in great shape and the chair is packed so well it probably could withstand a rough transport if it needed to. All around great experience for the price!
customer_reviews.author: SarahB

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assembly. Very impressed with the quality. Looks like it will stand up well yo long time use.
customer_reviews.author: M. OSHEA

customer_reviews.title: Coaster glider
customer_reviews.text: Not as nice as pictures, not as comfortable, ottoman sits to low, and does not glide smooth. Right size for room, but would not buy again, recliner does not hold, glider makes a lot of squeaking noise
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think I made a great choice.
customer_reviews.text: I had a lounge chair in my bedroom for many years. I finally decided to buy one that should last a long long time. I think I made a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: CMonk

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great price, very comfortable chair and it glides very well and so does the ottoman. My new twin grand babies love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Sanborn

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap chair the rungs will separate from the base of the fair rendering the fair inoperable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marty Cross

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These Chairs did not last but 9 months. When I called Coaster Fine Furniture they directed my back to Amazon, I was told since I did not purchase directly from them their product was not warranted. I purchased 3 chairs and all three have the exact same issue.
customer_reviews.author: maria martinez

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I had some problems with the delivery, from what I understand the first one sent out was lost by FedEx. However the supplier was quick in having another one dropped ship to me from the manufacture. The recliner was simple to put together, quite comfortable and seems to be sturdy. The only thing that kept me from rating it five stars is the question, that being made in China, how long will it last? Most things made there turn out to be junk.
customer_reviews.author: Guy R. Itter, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: I do wish it had a deeper setting for the reclining part but all-in-all a nice chair.
customer_reviews.text: I think a break-in period for the newness is called for as the cushions are certainly a little stiff. I do wish it had a deeper setting for the reclining part but all-in-all a nice chair.
customer_reviews.author: DayTrader

customer_reviews.title: turns out I love it
customer_reviews.text: The one I wanted didn't come in black so I picked this one. This chair is great. I do wish it had black metal instead of the silver and maybe a piece of leather that could hung down to hide the inner workings of the chair. It kind of looks more like an office chair the way it is
customer_reviews.author: moon goddess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, doesn’t make any noise and rocks smooth, big enough to fit tall person comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Jefferey sherman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this glider after searching many places, even local stores. This was a great price comparatively. It was easy to assemble. The color is great, and it is very comfortable. It has good back and neck support, and even my husband who is tall and broad-shouldered enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Easy to assemble, only draw back is lever has to be tightened very tight on the side or back of chair will come forward when you first sit in it. But if you tighten it tight it won't do it. Wife is not strong enough to tighten it to where it won't go forward.
customer_reviews.author: BARTON V.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, frame came bent
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these chairs. Both of the frames came bent. If not for my strong husband I probably would have given up on putting these together and sent them back. I'm glad we got them put together though because I do love them. The material wipes clean when needed and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: E. J. Manley

customer_reviews.title: I love that is was not only a glider but a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the Mother of my first Grandchild. I love that is was not only a glider but a recliner as well . Having upholstery that could be wiped off was also a high plus. I heard that it was so very comfy. Hopefully many hours of togetherness will be enjoyed. And by all the reviews it appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Moyra

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Instructions on assembly were atrocious, leaving you to guess on how you think it should be put together
customer_reviews.author: des

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the quality.
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are comfortable, swivel and recline smooth and look nice. So far they have help up well. The boxes they shipped in were reinforced by the shipper so that the corners and edges wouldn't get damaged. The only issue was that 2 screws for the ottoman were missing. Coaster sent a replacement hardware kit right away.
customer_reviews.author: pkodyssey

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair sits fine, padding is good, assembly was easy, 2 screws on the frame and install the pads. One thing I would mention, there is no way to lock the glide function. Not a big deal, just mentioning
customer_reviews.author: LesD

customer_reviews.title: awesome relaxing chair
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Like the silver frame. This replaced one I had for 12 years. The old one had a black frame and my cat finally took it over. This one is mine and I still love this kind of chair. So comfy to relax in and sometimes drift off to sleep. Best price on the net, no tax and no S&H.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Espenlaub

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Comfortable, but Smaller Than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and is very comfortable. It is smaller than I expected but works well in my new smaller living room. The only issue I have with it is that the footstool is too low when you use the chair in recliner mode.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my office's wellness room for new mothers. It got rave reviews from all! Comfortable chair and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bearing Broke After 2 weeks!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair as I have a newborn and this looked so comfortable for night time feedings, especially with the recline option. We used this chair for 2 weeks and heard an awful grinding sound. Only to find that the bearing was broken - this is the mechanism that allows the chair to glide and is also a part of the support for the chair. I contacted the manufacturer 3 weeks ago and I am still waiting for a replacement bearing - I am trying to fix it myself as opposed to returning it as the box was destroyed during shipment! I do think the chair is comfortable - but quality wise it is a bust!
customer_reviews.author: BellavitaRN

customer_reviews.title: Great Glider and ottoman
customer_reviews.text: This Glider is everything i was looking for in a glider. I really like it and it is so comfortable. and the ottoman was a bonus as well. they fit just right in my room. the color is great and will match whatever colors i change my room into. Also the best part is the price was just GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie L

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but light
customer_reviews.text: This Glider is comfortable and super soft material the only thing i do not like is that it is very light so when you are gliding back and forward the glider moves back and hits the wall also the handle that adjust the back doesn't hold in place for to long the second you sit up a little the glider go right back to its original position.
customer_reviews.author: Janetp729

customer_reviews.title: Still have not rec'd missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The chair is comfortable however the ottoman still needs it's bolts and the foot cushion so I may finish putting it together and give to the person I bought it for for Christmas. Also missing an additional bolt for the armrest. Went to the local hardware store and found a bolt that would work so at least the chair is assembled and functional. Chair fine but delivery of complete chair not satisfied at all. $200+ is a lot of money, at least for me, to not get the "full package". I have not heard back from the "parts dept" yet, when the rest of my parts will be coming.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for modest price!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble with screwdriver. Package contained all parts which were clearly marked. Looks exactly like the picture. I did remove the two small brown hard plastic pieces that another buyer mentioned - they're around the chair pivot points that keep it steady while in shipment. The only issue I have is that the side pockets were not sewn straight so they hang funny - QC issue but not worth returning the chair. This was why I only gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome .. if you have a newborn you need a chair like this.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what you'd expect .. comfortable, swivels, rocks etc and is totally necessary if you have a new born ..
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Good chair.
customer_reviews.text: works as intended. My only complaint is I need a pillow for lower back support while reclined. Sitting upright is comfortable. Customer service from the company was excellent. The first shipment had some parts missing so they sent a replacement chair free of charge and no hassling.
customer_reviews.author: Blitzfire

customer_reviews.title: Rip off!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Glider for my daughter who was pregnant not even 6 months after purchasing it the Glider broke at the weld. It was obviously not welded right. I tried contacting the company and they would never respond. It was such a waste of money. She could have gotten more use out of a cheaper one! Very displeased!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Osborne

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS HARD TO BELIEVE
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not this thing was assembled completely BACKWARD at the factory!!! Yes it was!! I had to call a friend who is an aircraft engine mechanic to tear it down to the beginning and re-assemble it. Once assembled, the chair was OK
customer_reviews.author: Teal

customer_reviews.title: Its ok under light use
customer_reviews.text: It was used with 2 children in the home and this is after 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great chair
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT I am tall so seat height is good for me. I sit in this chair every night to watch tv or read. Easy to put together color is more taupe than grey. I like the reclining, rocking and swivel action and so does my grandbaby and grand dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Schwaab

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought this chair to go into the motor home. It is now in our home!!
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Bagley

customer_reviews.title: makes a lot of noise when you rock in it ...
customer_reviews.text: makes a lot of noise when you rock in it. Also some of the stitching was coming out on the chair fabric cover. Hard to replace items. The only option would have been to take it all apart, box it up & return through the mail.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, late shipment!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, firm support. It did not arrive in 2 days as promised, but is in good condition and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Diabla

customer_reviews.title: awesome, good taupe color
customer_reviews.text: Needed to feed my baby at night! Swivels,rocks and reclines, awesome, good taupe color! It's ok on the comfort part not great but ok, then again that's probably a good thing so I don't fall asleep while feeding the baby!

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but locking mechanism slips
customer_reviews.text: The chair is generally comfortable. However, the problem we have experienced is the locking mechanism, which is designed to hold the reclining position selected in place, slips. Thus, we have to constantly readjust our sitting position, as the chair slowly reclines to its maximum relining position each time we sit in it. I don't know if this is an experience shared by other customers with this item, but it is definitely something to consider when contemplating this item.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a Coaster chair and searched through quite a lot of furniture stores; unfortunately only one had a chair that I could try out. All the others wanted to order one for me but I could do the same myself on the Internet. The only store that had my chair was selling it 61$ more than Amazon, plus tax. I was willing to pay a bit more for the advantage of trying it out but the price difference was too much. So I bought it on Amazon and got it delivered very fast and free for Christmas. It was quite easy to assemble and I love it. It swivels and rocks and is very comfortable.
